text:
Purchasing Agent - Buyer
Company: Lee-Mahoney
Location: [Insert Location]

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Purchasing Agent - Buyer to join our team. As a Purchasing Agent - Buyer, you will be responsible for procuring goods and services that meet the company's quality and pricing standards. If you are a detail-oriented and strategic thinker with excellent communication skills, we encourage you to apply.

Responsibilities:

 Source and procure goods and services that meet the company's quality and pricing standards
 Develop and maintain relationships with suppliers to ensure timely delivery and cost-effective solutions
 Analyze market trends and provide recommendations for cost savings and process improvements
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure procurement processes align with business objectives

Qualifications and Experience:
We are looking for a candidate with a degree in Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, or a related field. A minimum of 2 years of experience in procurement or a related field is required. Strong analytical and communication skills are essential for success in this role.

We Value Diversity:
At Lee-Mahoney, we are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workforce. We believe that a diverse team brings unique perspectives and ideas that drive innovation and growth. Women with the required skills are strongly preferred for this role, as we strive to empower women in procurement and supply chain management.

What We Offer:
We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from USD 60,000 to USD 80,000, based on your experience and skills. We also offer a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance, 401(k) matching, and paid time off.
